Text:
rUssKiNietpEtsaMo:
Who is the smatr one? Not you!

Its Nor subs. Norwegian subs....moron.

Learn to read properly before complaining!!

This film was originally made in English, which explains the English-speaking actors. This DVD is a Swedish dubbing with mono sound, so Swedes don't need Swedish subtitles. The Norwegian subs can be turned off.
A 770 Mb rip of the Swedish version with a STEREO soundtrack is still seeded here:
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/3717542/Mio.min.Mio.1987.SWEDISH.DVDrip.XviD-PiratKapten
There are people who can not hear at all, never are no subs needed, always include as much subs as possible, if possible also for the hearing impaired, thanks.
